Package org.sontana.engine

Class SceneManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sontana.engine.SceneManager
  • public class SceneManager
extends java.lang.Object
    SceneManager handles the switching, loading, and referencing of AbstractScene objects.
    Author:
    Christophe Simon

      • addScenes

        public static void addScenes​(java.util.List<AbstractScene> pScenes)
                      throws SceneManagerException
        Add multiple AbstractScene objects to the SceneManager.
        Parameters:
        pScenes - the List of AbstractScene objects.
        Throws:
        SceneManagerException - if scene already exists.

                     throws SceneManagerException
        Add an AbstractScene to the SceneManager.
        Parameters:
        pScene - the AbstractScene.
        Throws:
        SceneManagerException - if scene already exists.

      • getScene

        public static AbstractScene getScene​(java.lang.String pName)

        Returns:

      • loadScene

        public static void loadScene​(java.lang.String pSceneName)
                      throws SceneManagerException
        Load an AbstractScene of a given name into memory.
        Parameters:
        pSceneName - the AbstractScene object's name.
        Throws:
        SceneManagerException - if AbstractScene does not exist.

      • reloadScene

        public static void reloadScene()
                        throws SceneManagerException
        Reload the current active AbstractScene.
        Throws:
        SceneManagerException - if a scene does not exist or is null.
